description: This file contains data access functions for user entities, including retrieving a user by email and creating a new user in the database using SQLAlchemy ORM.

methods.name: Optional[User] get_user_by_email(db: Session, email: str)
methods.description: Retrieves a user from the database based on the provided email.

methods.name: User create_user(db: Session, email: str, hashed_password: str, full_name: str | None = None, is_admin: bool = False)
methods.description: Creates a new user in the database with provided details and returns the User object.

ctags.name: create_user
ctags.pattern: /^def create_user(db: Session, email: str, hashed_password: str, full_name: str | None = None, is_/
ctags.signature: (db: Session, email: str, hashed_password: str, full_name: str | None = None, is_admin: bool = False)
